text: Pen binɨb kuŋay ap yelak anɨb okok, nop pen agɨlak, Takaw Mosis ñu kɨl tɨkak ak chɨnop anɨgɨl agɨl agup, Bɨ God nop aglup ak, binɨb okok kɨlop dɨl kod yenɨgab ak, ne pel pelnep yenɨgab agup agɨlak. Anɨb ak taydɨl apan, Bɨ Olap Ñɨne nop dɨl dad aplanenɨgel apan agɨlak? Bɨ Olap Ñɨne anɨb ak, bɨ an agɨlak?
